original_text: Then he sent to Elijah a captain with his company of fifty men. The captain went up to Elijah, who was sitting on the top of a hill, and said to him, “Man of God, the king says, ‘Come down!’”
korean_text: 이에 오십부장과 그의 군사 오십 명을 엘리야에게로 보내매 그가 엘리야에게로 올라가 본즉 산 꼭대기에 앉아 있는지라 그가 엘리야에게 이르되 하나님의 사람이여 왕의 말씀이 내려오라 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: Then he sent to Elijah a captain
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 엘리야에게 한 대장을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: with his company of fifty men
The captain went up to Elijah
who was sitting on the top of a hill
